title: Machine Learning-Based R/C Column and Pier Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process of conducting team-based design projects in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze design variables based on cross-sectional shapes (rectangular/circular, solid/hollow) of R/C columns and piers.
Learners can understand structural analysis processes using machine learning models (ANN) and build simple predictive models.
Learners can explain design optimization techniques applied to real-world bridge design problems through team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
